summary: Diagnosed that requests were hanging because PHP lacked mbstring (Str::limit called mb_strimwidth). Installed php8.4-mbstring, restarted php artisan serve on 127.0.0.1:8001, and verified the homepage now returns HTTP 200 immediately.
current_status: Laravel dev server running on 127.0.0.1:8001 with mbstring enabled; site responds normally.
